message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is worth $1000000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special price of $950000. This is a significant discount, allowing you to secure this valuable asset without compromising on quality or desirability. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
